Summary: Whitish fast traveling rod or cigar shape flying object
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around April 10th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsOn April 10th, 2007 at 2:22PM. I was traveling on I45 north passed 1960 toward Woodlands, TX when I saw a whitish flying abject. When I first saw the object, I thought it was an airplane, but it caught my attention because it has some sort of lighting frequency. I had my sunglasses at the time, I lifted it up for a second to see what it was but I couldn't see it without my sunglasses. When I put my sunglasses back on, I saw it flew into a cloud. If it was an airplane and traveling as fast as it was before, it should reappear on the other side of the cloud in just a few seconds, but it didn't. I wonder if anyone else saw what happening?
